level.heading: Duration of Task Force.
level.text: The Task Force shall complete its study and submit its report to the Council and Mayor no later than February 28, 2011.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 6093 of Fiscal Year 2011 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-463, July 2, 2010, 57 DCR 6542).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-223
level.text: For Law 18-223, see notes following ยง 50-1121.
